title: What are tariffs? Trump's tariff plan explained
shortDescription: Put simply, tariffs are a tax on imports. Here's what Donald Trump did with them in his first term and how they impact the economy.

title: Trump's tariffs on Mexico and Canada could hike prices for these goods
shortDescription: The president-elect vowed to slap heavy tariffs on imports from some of the U.S.'s top trade partners. Here's how that could impact your spending.

title: Mexico's president warns Trump tariff could worsen US inflation
shortDescription: President Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo said tariffs could cause more inflation and result in job losses for the U.S. and Mexico.

title: What does Trump 2.0 mean for the economy? | The Excerpt
shortDescription: From enacting tariffs on foreign goods to slashing taxes for individuals and businesses, Trump’s economic populism is about to be put to the test.

title: 'No one will win a trade war': China responds to Trump tariff threats
shortDescription: Trump says he will sign an executive order imposing a 25% tariff on all goods coming from Mexico and Canada and a 10% tariff on those from China.

title: Medicare would cover costly weight loss drugs under Biden plan.
shortDescription: The Biden administration wants to expand coverage of anti-obesity medications to millions on Medicare, Medicaid.

title: Trump team probed whether top aide sought money from job seekers
shortDescription: Lawyers for Donald Trump probed allegations Boris Epshteyn asked would-be members of Trump's White House for money in exchange for helping their chances.

title: President Joe Biden honors service members during ‘Friendsgiving’
shortDescription: President Joe Biden and First lady Jill Biden served food during a dinner with U.S. service members and their families ahead of Thanksgiving at U.S. Coast Guard Sector New York on Staten Island, N.Y.

title: Trump vows to impose 25% tariff on all products from Canada and Mexico
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said he would impose a tariff on products from Canada and Mexico until they stop flow of drugs, migrant crossings.

title: Trump's 2024 barrier-breaking Cabinet appointees
shortDescription: Trump has named eight women to his cabinet, as well as the first gay Treasury Secretary. A look at some of President-elect Donald Trump's picks.

title: 'Treemendous' White House Christmas tree arrives
shortDescription: First lady Jill Biden, alongside her grandson Beau, received the White House Christmas Tree, which was donated by a Western North Carolina family.

title: DOJ seeks to drop Trump's Jan. 6 federal cases
shortDescription: The Justice Department opted to drop federal cases against President-elect Donald Trump ahead of his second term.

title: A pardon most 'fowl': Biden stops two turkeys from ending up as entrée
shortDescription: While the tradition of the official turkey presentation began in 1947 when President Harry Truman was president, they were frequently gobbled up.

title: Judge closes Jan. 6 case against Donald Trump at prosecutor's request
shortDescription: Justice Department special counsel Jack Smith's request to dismiss the charges against Trump was expected after he won the presidential election.

title: Trump to crank up oil and gas, offshore drilling: Sources
shortDescription: Trump will speed permits for drilling on federal lands and plans to kill tax credits for electric cars, sources told Reuters.

title: White House turkeys ‘gobble on’ after pardon
shortDescription: "Today, Peach and Blossom will join the free birds of the United States of America." Joe Biden pardoned two turkeys ahead of Thanksgiving.

title: What parts of Donald Trump's transition mirror Project 2025?
shortDescription: President-elect Trump has repeatedly denied affiliation with Project 2025, but some parts of the conservative mandate are already starting to unfold.

title: Kremlin says Trump's team is talking Ukraine peace as Biden escalates
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's choice for national security advisor said the U.S. should find "the framework of a deal."

title: 'Amtrak Joe' Biden's impact on America's railways will last decades
shortDescription: Train backers are waiting to see how the Trump administration will handle billions of dollars in planned rail spending.

title: President Joe Biden's legacy as "Amtrak Joe"
shortDescription: As a known train fan, President Joe Biden's legacy is likely to be linked to America's rail expansions approved under the Infrastructure Jobs Act

title: When is Inauguration Day 2025? Trump set to be sworn in
shortDescription: Donald Trump is building his Cabinet quickly, but he still has nearly two months until his swearing-in. Here is a lookback at previous performers.
